question:
Question: You are navigating to [the roof of the three floors ahead]. What is the correct summary of your trajectory from the beginning to your current position?  
Choice:  
A. I start from above the park, descend to street level, then move toward the three-story building and ascend to my current location.  
B. I start from the street, move toward the park, then turn to the three floors and rise to my current location.  
C. I start from the park, move toward the street, then rise to the height above the high-rise building, move toward the third floor, and finally reach my current location.  
D. I start from above the main road, fly forward and descend, and reach my current position.  
E. I start from a position above a high-rise building, move downward toward the street, and then move to a three-story building to reach my current location.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point above a high-rise building, moves downward toward the street level, and then approaches a three-story building to reach the current position on its roof. This matches the description in option E.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 13)]
Option: [E]
Reason: From the beginning of the video (0s), the camera is positioned above a high-rise building. It then moves downward towards the street and approaches a three-story building, eventually reaching the roof of the three-story building. This trajectory aligns with the description provided in option E.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point above a high-rise building, moves downward toward the street level, and then approaches a three-story building to reach the current position on its roof. This matches the description in option E.
